methods.int[] array(): Returns the int array that backs this buffer (optional operation).
methods.int arrayOffset(): Returns the offset within this buffer's backing array of the first element of the buffer (optional operation).
methods.IntBuffer asReadOnlyBuffer(): Creates a new, read-only int buffer that shares this buffer's content.
methods.IntBuffer duplicate(): Creates a new int buffer that shares this buffer's content.
methods.boolean equals(Object ob): Tells whether or not this buffer is equal to another object.
methods.boolean hasArray(): Tells whether or not this buffer is backed by an accessible int array.
methods.int hashCode(): Returns the current hash code of this buffer.
methods.boolean isDirect(): Tells whether or not this int buffer is direct.
methods.IntBuffer slice(): Creates a new int buffer whose content is a shared subsequence of this buffer's content.
methods.String toString(): Returns a string summarizing the state of this buffer.
methods.IntBuffer wrap(int[] array): Wraps an int array into a buffer.
methods.IntBuffer wrap(int[] array, int offset,: Wraps an int array into a buffer.
